-maybe there's nothing. -Yeah.

Ờ.
 - Nhưng bọn tôi biết là không. - Vậy tôi chẳng làm gì được đâu.

No, I didn't say anything.

Does she look different?

and we'll leave this place together.

so you and your parents don't have to do this.

Hey!

NATIONAL POLICE

-What?
